title: Stop by today and check out our lovely 1057 sq ft, 2 bed / 2 bath!

posting_body: ['-- Aster Meadow Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1800 - $2200', 'Apartment:', '2 Bedroom | 2 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '1057 sq ft', 'Our convenient location offers quick access around the Twin Cities area for work and entertainment while also providing comforts close to home.', 'Take in the breathtaking views of our 16-acre preserve, head outdoors to hit the trails, or grab a bite to eat at one of the many restaurant options just outside.', 'Aster Meadows is a luxurious property to call your own.', "Don't miss this opportunity to live your best life.", 'Call us today to learn about our lease terms.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed.', 'Maximum Dogs: 2, Maximum Cats: 1, Maximum weight: 60 lbs., Initial fee: 300, Additional rent: $50, Deposit: $300', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '➢ Bike Racks', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ FOB Controlled Building Access', '➢ Garden Plaza', '➢ Library', '➢ Outdoor Courtyard', '➢ Playground', '➢ Walking/Biking Trails', '➢ 16-Acre View Of Natural Wetland', '➢ Heated Gazebo', '➢ Heated Underground Parking', '➢ Huge Covered Decks', '➢ Large Grill Area', '➢ On Site Management & Maintenance', '➢ Outdoor Fireplace, Fire Table & Kitchen', '➢ Party Room', '➢ Pet Wash Station', '➢ Private Offices', 'Apartment features include:', '➢ Balcony/Patio', '➢ Central Heating & Cooling', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Eat-in Kitchen', '➢ Ice Maker', '➢ Oven', '➢ Pantry', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Wi-Fi', '➢ Den', '➢ Gorgeous View', '➢ Granite/Quartz Countertops', '➢ High-Speed Internet Access: Cable & Century', 'OnLink Ready', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Office', '➢ Stainless Steel Appliances', '➢ Storage Lockers Available', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'SundayBy Appointment', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '4143-4145 Centerville Rd', 'Vadnais Heights, MN 55127', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable, Monthly, 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Managed by Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '0EB98524C1F8479B']
